nws_periods.name: This Afternoon
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny, with a high near 87. South wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws_periods.name: Tonight
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 1am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 1am and 4am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly cloudy, with a low around 76. South wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nws_periods.name: Wednesday
nws_periods.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms Likely
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7am, then showers and thunderstorms likely between 7am and 1pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Partly sunny, with a high near 88. South wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

nws_periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Partly cloudy, with a low around 75. Southwest wind 0 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.
